Harmful triggering content

For systems with potentially triggering content, people may need to identify sensitive content in advance and avoid it.

Comment on this item

Notes

Is there an adjust?

We may need a characteristic for content that can trigger mental health concerns, e.g., the news

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
Mental healthPhysical safetyAvoid
